data.message:
I've decided to unfollow Eminem. Not because he attacked Trump and his voters (yes - I'm one). I'm done following him because his freestyle rap was horrifically bad!!! 

Eminem in his prime would've had me singing along to "F" Trump. He needs to get back in the lab, with a pen and a pad to get back the talent he once had.

replies.message: Stop lying. His shit sounds the same as always. You're unfollowing because you're butt hurt.
The rhyming wasn't even there Arturo Mendez. Also he sounds like a grandpa now. Voice all raspy and abused and shit. Not to mention he looks like a crackhead.
It was soooo bad I couldn’t believe it was him rapping. He needs to retire.

Arturo Mendez did you listen to the freestyle rap? That was horrible. 

If you're going to make an anti-Trump rap - at least make it catchy with a good hook and I'll sing right along. 

If you disagree - please name a recent Eminem rap song you enjoy. I'd say "I'm Not Afraid" - 2010.
Lol to the imbred pieces of shit who think this was a song instead of a message.
Justin Stratton Are you some sort of moron?
I wish he had put a beat behind it and written it to make sure it rhymed and was accurate
Eric he is a moron. But what is your profile pic Eric lowe??? It's fucking hilarious!! 😂
I raise American Bulldogs. Good looking pups!
They are eating each other's face! I shit myself when I saw that lol. I love American bulldogs. They are such big dummies haha
- Wow...Em got All the Trumptards "TRIGGERED!" LOL?!
Yeah he has fell off for sure, he was winded the whole time making it even more discombobulated.
